body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is David Moore and the customer's name is Joyce Griffin.  The conversation is about Bob's Gym (a Gym ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Bright Solutions. My name is Alex. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, I'm looking to inquire about your services.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'd be happy to help you with that. Could I start by getting your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, John. Can I please have your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. And can I also have your contact phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you very much. Is there anything specific you'd like to know about our services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'd just like to get a general overview.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, I'll send an overview to your email right away. Thank you for your time, John. Have a great day!
